level.heading: DISPOSITION OF REPORTS OF FETAL DEATHS (ยง 29-2812)

level.text: Reports of fetal death, required to be filed pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง 7-213(a), are statistical reports that shall only be used for medical and health purposes and shall not be incorporated into the permanent official records of the system of vital records.
The Registrar is authorized to dispose of the reports of fetal death when all statistical processing of the reports is complete.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 38 DCR 781, 793 (January 25, 1991); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 1664 (February 23, 2007).
